description: Yan Restaurant redefined our dining experience! From the exquisite Eggs Benedict to the perfectly grilled salmon, every dish was a masterpiece. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a gastronomic delight!
name: Rachel Smith

description: An incredible culinary journey at Yan Restaurant! The sushi platter was both visually stunning and packed with flavor. The ambiance and friendly staff made it a night to remember.
name: Sarah Johnson

description: An adventure for the taste buds! Yan Restaurant's butter curry tofu was rich and flavorful, paired perfectly with fluffy rice. A must-visit for anyone who loves comfort food with a twist.
name: Michael Wong

description: Good overall experience, but the wait time for our food was longer than expected. The flavors were worth it, though!
name: Emily Davis

description: I had high hopes for Yan Restaurant, but the truffle bacon fries fell short of expectations. The presentation was nice, but the flavors didn't quite deliver.
name: Christopher Patel

description: Yan Restaurant exceeded all expectations with their Green Herb Salad and glazed salmon. The flavors were fresh, and the attention to detail was unparalleled. Can't wait to come back!
name: Jessica Martinez

description: Yan Restaurant offered an exceptional dining experience. The truffle cheese bacon fries and sushi platter were the highlights of the evening. Highly recommend for a cozy dinner outing.
name: Ryan Thompson

description: Absolutely loved our meal at Yan Restaurant! The seamless reservation process and delicious dishes made for an unforgettable evening. Can't wait to explore more of their menu!
name: Amanda Garcia

description: Dining at Yan Restaurant was a dream come true! The sushi platter was fresh and creative, and the butter curry tofu was simply divine. A perfect place for a weekend dinner.
name: Kevin Wilson

description: Yan Restaurant made our dinner unforgettable! From the warm ambiance to the beautifully plated dishes, every moment was a delight.
name: Lauren Rodriguez

description: Yan Restaurantâ€™s team provided us with a cozy and flavorful evening. The Green Herb Salad was light and refreshing, while the truffle fries added a decadent touch.
name: Brandon Lee

description: A truly magical experience! The butter curry tofu was bursting with flavors, and the fresh herb salad was a perfect complement. Highly recommend Yan Restaurant for food lovers.
name: Jonathan Brown

description: Yan Restaurant provided a remarkable experience. From the sushi platter to the attentive service, every detail was just perfect. A must-visit!
name: Samantha Taylor

description: The attentive service and the beautifully presented dishes at Yan Restaurant made for a memorable meal. Would love to return for their signature dishes.
name: Daniel Martinez

description: The Green Herb Salad was delightful, but the butter curry tofu lacked depth in flavor. An overall decent experience, but room for improvement.
name: Ashley Nguyen
